price: Leave to Me the deniers who are having a life of luxury, and bear with them for a little while.
arabic: وَذَرۡنِي وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ أُوْلِي ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِيلًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
